definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: This technique, with its fast and strong feature, is relatively easy to use.
sentences.chinese: 跆拳道橫踢技術的動作特點是快速有力且較易使用。

sentences.english: I agree to take part in the Taekwondo Competition.
sentences.chinese: 參加貴會所協辦之跆拳道比賽。

sentences.english: Kickboxing is a kind of traditional oriental martial technique.
sentences.chinese: 跆拳道是一項極具東方特色的傳統武技。

sentences.english: Mia is an American professional boxer and Tae Kwon Do champion.
sentences.chinese: 米亞是美國職業拳擊手，也是跆拳道冠軍。

sentences.english: New performances such as taekwondo and ballet have been added.
sentences.chinese: 加入了像跆拳道和芭蕾舞這樣的新表演。

sentences.english: Virgil, it's the first time for me to watch a taekwondo competition .
sentences.chinese: 弗吉爾，這是我第一次看跆拳道比賽。

sentences.english: In addition, the WTF Demonstration Team performed four times every day.
sentences.chinese: 此外，WTF跆拳道示範團每天做四次表演。

sentences.english: I think a robust man like him will win the kickboxing match.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得像他那麼強壯的人會贏得這場跆拳道比賽的。

sentences.english: The taekwondo dates back to 50 B. C.
sentences.chinese: 跆拳道可以追溯到公元前50年。

sentences.english: The letter of intent concerned both para-taekwondo kyorugi and poomsae.
sentences.chinese: 意向書涉及殘障跆拳道對打和品勢。

sentences.english: Taekwondo first participated in the Deaflympics in 2009.
sentences.chinese: 2009年跆拳道首次出現在聽障奧運會中。

sentences.english: Oh, my god.Are you the Black Belt queen of Taekwondo?
sentences.chinese: 我的天啊，你難道就是傳說中的跆拳道黑帶女王？

sentences.english: The Montreal Muslim Taekwondo team was able to compete again.
sentences.chinese: 蒙特利爾穆斯林跆拳道隊能夠再次競爭。

sentences.english: My favorite sport is Taekwondo. I started to learn it four years ago.
sentences.chinese: 小作者開篇點題，說出了自己最喜歡的運動是跆拳道。

sentences.english: This afternoon, I went back to school to train the taekwondo.
sentences.chinese: 今天下午，我回校訓練跆拳道。

sentences.english: She was in karate, taek-wan do, and wrestling.
sentences.chinese: 她練過空手道，跆拳道和摔跤。

definition: military skill or technique (in former times)/all kinds of martial art sports (some claiming spiritual development)/self-defense/tradition of choreographed fights from opera and film (recent usage)/also called kungfu 功夫/CL:種|种[zhong3]
Changquan - Northern Shaolin (北少林) - Longfist - Martial Art
